title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard without typing anything in the package name field, a message saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' appears at the top.
EB: When invoking the New Java Package wizard without typing anything in the package name field, there should be no message. If the package name field is left empty, the message should not appear.
SR:
1. Open the New Java Package wizard.
2. Leave the package name field empty.
3. Verify that no message saying 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' appears at the top.
